name: Wondersea Confectionary - Early Demo
description:
Wondersea Confectionary is a comforting, reactive, and visually rich narratively driven adventure game about baking, exploring, and awakening a lost world. Dive into the world of Oceanos, meet the sleeping remnants of Ami's childhood creations, and grow your recipe book as you unravel their story. What will you bring home?

Gather ingredients, bake desserts, and grow your horizons together with the new (old) friends that you meet.

Currently the game is at an early stage in development, and you can play a short demo below for Windows and Mac platforms. Our dream platform is the Nintendo Switch, and we aim to release a polished, beautiful demo by May 2022. Thank you for joining us so early in our journey! 

Please report any bugs to: lucidshibagames@gmail.com
